title: 24L05  Auto rebuilding establishment.
text:
An establishment engaged in auto
rebuilding, such as rebuilding auto engines or transmissions, is not considered
a nonmanufacturing establishment for purposes of Sec 13(b)(10). (See also FOH
21fa00.)
html: An establishment engaged in auto rebuilding, such as rebuilding auto engines or transmissions, is not considered a nonmanufacturing establishment for purposes of Sec 13(b)(10). (See also FOH 21fa00.)
